etymology.description: 口(口) (kǒu, "mouth") + phonetic: 夂(夊) (zhǐ, "go") = sound element -> "each"
etymology.interpretation: The character 各(各) (gè, "each") combines 口(口) (kǒu, "mouth") representing a semantic element with 夂(夊) (zhǐ, "go") for the phonetic aspect, suggesting the pronunciation and semantic concept of different mouths taking separate paths.

examples.chinese: 他们各自承担责任(他們各自承擔責任)。
老师将试卷分给各个学生(老師將試卷分給各個學生)。
examples.pinyin: Lǎoshī jiāng shìjuàn fēn gěi gègè xuésheng.
examples.english: The teacher distributed the test papers to each student.

examples.chinese: 会议上(會議上)，各部门各显其能(各部門各顯其能)。
examples.pinyin: Huìyì shàng, gè bùmén gè xiǎn qí néng.
examples.english: At the meeting, each department exhibited its capabilities.
